commands.name: az storage blob immutability-policy delete
commands.syntax:
az storage blob immutability-policy delete --container-name
                                           --name
                                           [--account-key]
                                           [--account-name]
                                           [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                           [--blob-endpoint]
                                           [--connection-string]
                                           [--sas-token]
                                           [--timeout]
examples: az storage blob immutability-policy delete -c mycontainer -n myblob --account-name mystorageaccount --account-key 0000-0000

commands.name: az storage blob immutability-policy set
commands.syntax:
az storage blob immutability-policy set --container-name
                                        --name
                                        [--account-key]
                                        [--account-name]
                                        [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                        [--blob-endpoint]
                                        [--connection-string]
                                        [--expiry-time]
                                        [--policy-mode {Locked, Unlocked}]
                                        [--sas-token]
                                        [--timeout]
examples: az storage blob immutability-policy set --expiry-time 2021-09-07T08:00:00Z --policy-mode Unlocked -c mycontainer -n myblob --account-name mystorageaccount
az storage blob immutability-policy set --policy-mode Locked -c mycontainer -n myblob --account-name mystorageaccount
